entry.title: Glaceau - Smartwater Vapour Distilled Water PET - 12 x 1 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Glaceau
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 31.99

  • Product Details:
  • Pack of six, 33.8 Oz (1L) per bottle of vapor distilled water with electrolytes added for taste
  • Pure and crisp like from a cloud
  • Perfect size for on-the-go hydration
  • vapor-distilled with electrolytes added for taste, smartwater offers a bottled water that's simple, pure, and delicious.
  • smartwater is a purified water made using vapor distillation, a purification process that simulates the hydrologic cycle — similar to the way water is purified in nature.
  • containing a unique blend of calcium, magnesium, and potassium, smartwater creates a taste that is distinctly fresh, crisp, and pure.
  • free of sugar, calories, coloring, and artificial flavors, smartwater is the smart way to hydrate and quench your thirst in the office, at home, or on the go.
  • environmentally conscious bottle is up to 30% plant-based and 100% recyclable.

entry.title: San Benedetto - Natural Mineral Water PET - 24 x 500 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: San Bendetto
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 19.99

San Benedetto - Natural Mineral Water PET - 24 x 500 ml

San Benedetto was arguably the original favorite of the Republic of Venice, in vogue with aristocratic Venetian families during the Renaissance. The water, tapped at the surface in ancient times, is now drawn from 1,000 feet below ground to ensure that all its original features are unchanged, and unadulterated; the water trickles to its source from the glaciers of the Dolomites. Without question, San Benedetto is an elite, low-mineral delicacy that carries a 30 milligram per liter punch of Magnesium. The San Benedetto bottle is pretty, and is available in both still and sparkling versions.

  • 0% sodium
  • Subterranean, 100% Italian artisan water
  • Less taste interference, purer water taste
  • Active commitment to the reduction of Co2 emissions
  • Bottled in Italy

entry.title: VOSS - Artesian Still Water Plastic Bottle - 24 x 330 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Voss
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 34.99

  • Product Details:
  • Pure artesian water
  • With its iconic design, Voss is served on the tables, in the homes and in the rooms of the most distinctive places worldwide
  • The company is proud of its ongoing commitment to the Voss foundation and maintaining 100% carbon neutrality
  • Voss artesian bottled water is taken from a virgin aquifer that, according to the company, has been shielded for centuries under ice and rock in the untouched wilderness of Central Norway.

entry.title: Aquafina - Pure Water - 12 x 1.5 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aquafina
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 27.99

Aquafina - Pure Water - 15 x 1 L

AQUAFINA is bottled water that is able to guarantee consistent purity and great taste due to a state-of-the-art purification process.

Fresh and pure, Aquafina water is the perfect companion for happy bodies everywhere. Aquafina is on a mission to make bodies happy everywhere, because happy bodies move more, laugh more, live more and have all the fun. From morning to night, crisp and refreshing Aquafina hydrates your body so you can focus on living and enjoying life to the fullest. What is the secret of our perfectly pure tasting water? Our 7-step purification system. It takes out the stuff other bottled waters leave in, leaving just pure water and perfect taste in every sip.

entry.title: Acqua Panna - Natural Spring Water Plastic Bottle - 24 x 500 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Acqua Panna
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 30.99

Acqua Panna - Natural Spring Water Plastic Bottle - 24 x 500 ml

Sourced from Panna spring water, located along the ancient route connecting Florence and Bologna in Italy, guests are sure to notice the pure, high-quality nature of the water. In this unique journey, the water is naturally crafted into alkaline spring water with a pH of 8.0 or higher.

Distinctively Fresh Impression

With its refreshing taste and velvety-smooth finish, this still natural mineral water is excellent for pairing with your finest red and white wines and any cultural cuisine. This water is favored by chefs and sommeliers around the world, and is described as the smoothest tasting water. Acqua Panna also makes a great palate cleaner when sampling different beverages at wine or coffee tastings.

Glass Bottling

Coming in elegant glass bottles embodying the picturesque beauty of Tuscany, Italy, this natural spring water is perfect for serving at fine dining establishments, catering events, and banquets.

Sealed on Cap

A sealed on cap preserves the freshness of the water that has been on a 14 year journey through the sun-drenched hills of Tuscany.

Trusted Brand

Acqua Panna takes great pride in bottling unaltered mineral water from uncontaminated land thanks to its protective methods and rigorous monitoring system. With Acqua Panna, rest assure that you are served the highest-quality natural spring water to your high-quality guests.

  • Fresh-tasting, fine dining natural spring water
  • Perfect for serving at fine dining establishments, catering events, and banquets
  • Packaged in an elegant glass bottle
  • Velvety-smooth finish

entry.title: Evian - Natural Spring Water Glass Bottle - 12 x 750 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Evian
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 31.99

Evian - Still Mineral Water Glass Bottle - 12 x 750 ml

Evian is uniquely sourced mineral water that’s always naturally hydrating and refreshing, with nothing added for taste or enhanced with extras - so you can reach your natural peak. Delicately crafted by nature with a unique 15 year journey through the heart of the French Alps, with naturally occurring minerals, electrolytes and a balanced pH.

There’s nothing more essential to life than water, and evian natural mineral water hydrates you the way nature intended: with no extra additives or enhancements, just its naturally occurring electrolytes and mineral composition. All of Evian products are designed to bring you natural mineral water straight from the French Alps, so you can enjoy the distinctive cool, crisp taste of evian anytime, anywhere.

Evian® owes everything to nature, so we are committed to preserving it. Certified Carbon Neutral. Perfect for staying hydrated throughout the day

entry.title: Eska - Natural Spring Water - 2 x 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eska
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 5.99

Eska - Natural Spring Water - 2 x 4 L

Quebec’s very own natural spring water.

Eska Natural and Carbonated spring water is sourced in northern Quebec. It’s naturally land-crafted and filtered by the glacial sediment of the Saint-Mathieu-Lac-Berry esker which gives it its crisp, pure, refreshing taste.

Our non-carbonated, natural spring water bottles are now made of 100% recycled plastic and are 100% recyclable.  Because preserving and protecting the environment is at the heart of who we are.
